survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from employees regarding their preferences and experiences with corporate event planning to improve future events.

questions.question_text: How often do you attend corporate events organized by your company?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice scale to measure frequency of attendance.

script.question_text: How often do you attend corporate events organized by your company?

questions.question_text: What type of corporate events do you prefer? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Celebratory events (e.g., holiday parties, milestone celebrations)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice scale to capture preferences.

script.question_text: What type of corporate events do you prefer? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Celebratory events (e.g., holiday parties, milestone celebrations)

questions.question_text: What is your preferred time of day for corporate events?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice scale to determine time preferences.

script.question_text: What is your preferred time of day for corporate events?

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to you when deciding to attend a corporate event? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice scale with a limit of 3 selections.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Checkbox with max selection of 3

script.question_text: What factors are most important to you when deciding to attend a corporate event? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: Please share any additional comments or suggestions for improving corporate events.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: Please share any additional comments or suggestions for improving corporate events.
